message: Let's start fair. I'll take the lion's share this round, but we can work things out for the future.
My turn to propose.  The value decreases quickly for you Alice. Let's make a deal!

This is getting ridiculous.  Let's split it evenly before the value drops too much for me.  It's in your best interest to agree, as you'll continue to get the same amount, but I'll get less and less with each round.
